definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.chinese: 性衝動本能的力量是什麼？

sentences.english: The erotic impulse is sublimated into art.
Ask them when they think a person would be ready to have sex.
sentences.chinese: 問他們，他們認爲什麼時候一個人會有性衝動。

sentences.english: Testosterone increases the sex drive in both males and females.
sentences.chinese: 而睾丸激素會增強男女雙方的性衝動。

sentences.english: In your view, does this awfulness include eroticism and love?
sentences.chinese: 在你看來，性衝動和性愛也包括在這種不快裏面嗎？

sentences.english: The link between sex drive and attractions to men and women.
sentences.chinese: 男女之間性衝動和性吸引的聯繫。

sentences.english: What didn’t turn these women on, you ask?
sentences.chinese: 你問有什麼不能讓女人性衝動？

sentences.english: There are more factors that influence a woman's sex drive than a man's.
sentences.chinese: 影響女人性衝動的原因比男人更多。

sentences.english: It can make her feel both sexually excited and safe at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 這能夠讓她同時感覺到性衝動和安全。

definition: hiding a sickness for fear of treatment (idiom); fig. concealing a fault to avoid criticism/to keep one's shortcomings secret/to refuse to listen to advice
to suffer defeat in every battle (idiom)
